name: .VP4
summary: Learn about .VP4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open VP4 files with PREMIER+ Embroidery software in Windows and macOS. To open the file, select File → Open... and select the VP4 file.
To convert a VP4 file to another embroidery format, select File → Export and choose the format. Supported formats include VP3, .PES, .PEC, .VIP, .HUS, .JEF, .SEW, and .PCS.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .vp4 file in PREMIER+ 2 Embroidery
images.caption: VP4 file open in PREMIER+ 2 Embroidery
